name: PlanEat AI
tagline: AI turns your health goals into a 7-day menu & grocery list
description: Most apps drown you in recipes; chatbots drown you in text. PlanEat AI turns your health data and food rules into one realistic weekly plan and a grouped shopping list, so you don‚Äôt have to prompt, copy-paste or build spreadsheets by hand. Set it up once and try the weekly flow with a free trial.

name: PocketCorder
tagline: Remote control your mac from smartphone
description: Put your dev environment in your pocket with PocketCorder. Control your Mac from your iPhone or iPad with low latency and high efficiency. Perfect for developers who need to check processes or run commands anywhere‚Äîfrom bed to a cafe. Features include secure Cloudflare Tunnel access, one-tap command shortcuts, and a focused App Mode. Setup is instant via QR code; no complex VPNs needed. Download the free Mac companion app to get started.

name: Momotaro
tagline: Minimal, calm timer for iOS that invites you to focus.
description: A minimal, calm timer for iOS that invites you to pause and focus. Pick a duration, start the timer, and unlock soothing color themes as you accumulate focus minutes.

name: Nice
tagline: Track your sex life privately. Sync with your partner.
description: Nice helps you understand your sex life without compromising your privacy. Track activities, partners, moods, and moments‚Äîwith optional photo and video attachments. See patterns with daily, weekly, and monthly insights. Sync seamlessly with a partner via iCloud, or keep it just for yourself. Unlike other apps, Nice never creates accounts, never touches a server, and never collects your data. Everything stays encrypted on your device. Built for individuals, couples, and anyone in between.

name: We2
tagline: AI-powered questions that bring couples closer instantly
description: We2 is an AI-powered app that creates fun, deep, romantic, and flirty questions tailored to your relationship. No signup needed ‚Äî open the app and spark a meaningful conversation instantly. Choose your mood (Romantic, Fun, Deep, Flirty) and get personalized prompts that help couples connect, communicate, laugh, and explore each other. Perfect for date nights, long-distance relationships, or strengthening your bond daily

name: Enhanced Image Viewer
tagline: Chrome's image viewer, but with zoom, pan, and more
description: A Chrome extension for zooming, panning, and viewing images full-screen with customizable settings. Perfect for exploring high-res photos and detailed images. Provides special support for image-rich sites like Reddit and image hosting sites.

name: prompts.chat
tagline: Collect, organize, and share AI prompts. Free & Open Source.
description: prompts.chat: The social platform for AI prompts! Born from the #33 most-starred GitHub repo (Awesome ChatGPT Prompts), we've built the missing home for prompt engineers. ‚ú® Share, discover & collect prompts from the community. üîÑ Contribute improvements with GitHub-style change requests. üìä Climb the Promptmasters leaderboard. üè† Self-host for your team with complete privacy. Free, open source, and built for the AI-native era. Stop losing your best prompts in chat history or X feeds.

name: FastMoss Ad Insights 1.0
tagline: AI-powered Ad Insights for TikTok Shop growth.
description: FastMoss helps TikTok Shop sellers and creators discover the best-performing ads, analyze competitor strategies, and get instant creative inspiration. With daily-updated Ad Insights across 14 countries, you can quickly find winning creatives, understand how top sellers scale, and create high-converting content faster.

name: Superlore AI
tagline: Create long-form audio documentaries on any topic in 30s.
description: Superlore.ai is an AI-powered platform that creates long-form audio documentaries on-demand. Simply input a topic, choose a duration, and click create. Within 30 seconds, you'll have an audio episode complete with expert narration, thoughtful pacing, a live transcript, and professional sound design. No sign up required!

name: CitiScene
tagline: See your weather come alive
description: CitiScene transforms real-world forecasts into beautiful AI-crafted 3D scenes‚Äîbringing your city‚Äôs weather to life.

name: DukaanMate
tagline: Har Dukaan Ka Digital Saathi
description: DukaanMate is a smart and simple digital store management tool designed for local shop owners, students, and small businesses. It helps replace manual registers with an easy-to-use online platform. With DukaanMate, anyone can manage products, track sales, record expenses and analyze business performance in one place ‚Äî without technical knowledge or setup costs. Built to support Indian shops like general stores, stationery, tiffin services, salons, clothing stores, and more..

name: OpenMemory
tagline: Give AI agents long-term memory. Not vector search or RAG
description: Your AI assistant that never forgets you again and finally gives your AI continuity and personality. OpenMemory gives AI agents real long-term memory. Not vector search. Not RAG. Actual memory. Long‚Äëterm memory for AI systems. Self‚Äëhosted. Local‚Äëfirst. Explainable. Scalable. A full cognitive memory engine ‚Äî not a vector database. Add Memory to AI/Agents in one line.

name: Catchy Ai
tagline: Instant deepfake detection for any image
description: Deepfakes are no longer a futuristic threat ‚Äî they are part of daily life now. Fake profile photos, AI-edited faces, manipulated news images, and scams. Most people can‚Äôt tell what‚Äôs real anymore, and misinformation is becoming a serious social problem. Catchy AI was built to give everyone a simple, fast, and trustworthy way to verify image authenticity. No technical skills, no complicated tools ‚Äî just upload an image and get the truth in seconds.

name: inkiro ai
tagline: The linkedin content platform to help your team post more.
description: inkiro ai is a LinkedIn content creation platform that helps your team post more consistently via authentic LinkedIn posts.

name: Azm
tagline: Productivity app
description: Azm is a productivity tool that helps you set clear goals, break them into smaller tasks, and stay organized. It lets you manage projects, assign priorities, set deadlines, and track your progress easily. By turning big goals into simple, actionable steps, Azm keeps you focused, motivated, and on track‚Äîwhether you're working on personal plans or team projects.

name: SearchGPT Plus
tagline: Free chat gpt alternative
description: Search smarter with SearchGPT Plus, your free Chat GPT alternative for writing, learning & productivity. Try GPT search with instant, intelligent results.

name: Recession Tracker
tagline: The recession dashboard for busy investors
description: A live dashboard that scores recession risk 0-100, tracks 20+ economic indicators, and sends you daily AI analysis at 9 AM, and updates live data hourly. Know when to go defensive before the mainstream media catches on. 5-10 minutes/day. No technical analysis or crypto casino hype.

name: AutoRemind
tagline: Easy reminders for busy professionals
description: Easy reminders for busy professionals. Automated SMS reminders for your clients.

name: Shutterly - Dating Photos for Men
tagline: Create better dating photos from your selfies. 8x matches.
description: Shutterly creates photoreal dating photos from your selfies. Upload 8 to 15 images and get natural looking profile shots trained on your real features. Users report up to 8x more matches thanks to improved lighting, angles and clarity. Built for men who want stronger profiles without a photoshoot.

name: y4yes
tagline: Free, privacy-first network tools for developers.
description: Diagnose network issues instantly with y4yes. Free online tools for Developers and Admins: Check Public IP, DNS Propagation, SSL Status, Ping Test, and Port Scanning.
